key_observations: HiddenState is a 'boundary object' representing semantic state before text projection
Attached to Message via WithHiddenState() method
Measures DEff, Beta, Alignment, CPair metrics

patterns_discovered: Parallel collections of Conversations and Measurements in Session
Optional HiddenState as boundary object between semantic and text representation
Measurements reference Session/Conversation by ID strings
Measurements store independent copies of HiddenStates
gotchas_discovered: Measurements require hidden states for analysis
No direct references between Measurements and Conversations

approach_outcome.goal: Document type relationships and data flow
approach_outcome.key_result: Created comprehensive type hierarchy mental model

recommendations: Document type relationships and semantic flow
Include performance/memory notes for HiddenState vectors
Establish documentation conventions for future packages
